NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Section
templateId Slice: Unordered, Open by value:root, value:extension
templateId 1..1templateId
root 1..1root
Required Pattern: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.1
extension 1..1extension
Required Pattern: 2014-06-09
code 1..1code
code 1..1code
Required Pattern: 42349-1
codeSystem 1..1codeSystem
Required Pattern: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1
title 1..1title
text 1..1text
entry Slice: Unordered, Open by value:act
entry 0..*entry
act 1..1http://hl7.org/fhir/cda/StructureDefinition/Actact

Documentation for this format

name: Reason for Referral Section (V2)
description: This section describes the clinical reason why a provider is sending a patient to another provider for care. The reason for referral may become the reason for visit documented by the receiving provider.

element.label: Exceptional Value Detail
element.definition: If a value is an exceptional value (NULL-value), this specifies in what way and why proper information is missing.
When valued in an instance, this attribute signals the imposition of realm-specific constraints. The value of this attribute identifies the realm in question

When valued in an instance, this attribute signals the imposition of constraints defined in an HL7-specified message type. This might be a common type (also known as CMET in the messaging communication environment), or content included within a wrapper. The value of this attribute provides a unique identifier for the type in question.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:1098-7844) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:1098-7844) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15427).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:1098-7846).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:1098-7847).
